entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Dereference of a managed function pointer is not invariant #91846
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'gtOper < GT_COUNT' during 'VN-based dead store removal' #91839
  • JIT: "Mismatch in align instruction" in superpmi-replay #91838
    8.0.0
  • Do not edit the file if the function is centered #91837
  • Failure in building devcontainer with tag v7.0.9. #91836

Closed

  • Windows service stops with `KERNELBASE.dll` fault after user-handled exception when using outdated packages in .NET 7 #91447
    9.0.0
  • Social Security Account Info. AI Synching Connection Breaking illegal hacking & cipher www.login.gov/(...)_biometry/ECIP :: {§§} :: WILLFUL INFRINGEMENT eCFR :: §§ :: @HAL(L)EX *'©'* Pseudodatis©'° encryption CODEMedia©`°DNACoding HollingerDerekWarren(.) my Project© Organization© ;_& ©Entity "*FUTURE STEALTH CIVILIAN PASSENGER & CARGO AIRLINES AIR TRAVEL AIR SERVICE LLC, DBA,s Id Affix *" ...Vs C.O.P.S. AI sync & Police Public SAFETY :: §§ :: gitLAB`°github.url.cli Vs Coding etc MV transfers e.g. www.go-to.reddit.ymr #91841
  • JIT: Bad codegen with try/finally #91576
    8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-rc1] Assertion failed in 'System.Numerics.BigIntegerCalculator:PowCore during 'Generate code' #90693
    8.0.0
  • [mono][aot] MonoAOT BDN build crashing with SIGABRT #91819
    9.0.0
  • Can native aot run on windows 7? #91830
  • [API Proposal]: High-performance, low-allocation convenience "writer" for Span<T> and Memory<T> #91728
  • Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection NuGet Package Missing README File #86663
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasm] Don't link in debugger component in release mode. #91848
    area-Build-mono
  • Cleanup defines for specialized handle types #91847
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix old gcc build #91845
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove unnecessary rid argument to dotnet-restore #91844
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasi] Fix WasmLinkIcalls and WasmNativeStrip support. #91843
    area-Build-mono
  • BindConfiguration registers change token source with the right options name #91842
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] JIT: Fix invalid zero-init suppression for untracked variables #91840
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] [wasm] Remove manual ThrowIfCancellationRequested from ReadAsync response streaming #91834
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Refresh Test #91833
    area-GC-coreclr
  • The IConfiguration.GetSection method will not return null, call the IConfigurationSection.Exists extension method to determine. #91832
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • NativeAOT runtime PAL cleanup #91831
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make `BundlerConsistencyTests` stop building/copying self-contained project unnecessarily #91829
    test-enhancement, area-Single-File

Merged

  • ARM64: Enable jumptable to BT optimization #91811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix invalid zero-init suppression for untracked variables #91580
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Use g_malloc instead of malloc in giconv.c. #91807
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono] Avoid an assert when calling X86Base.Pause in non-llvm mode. #91828
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [MT][debugger] Block failing test `MiscTests.TestDebugUsingMultiThreadedRuntime` #91787
    arch-wasm, disabled-test, area-Debugger-mono

Updated

  • Converge Representations between NativeAOT and CoreCLR #91821
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Test improvements for #8418 on CI #91694
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix fgDebugCheckFlags checks for FTN_ADDR #91766
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NOT READY] GC: Rearrange finalization queue to put freelist in middle #91029
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Reduce work done by RuntimeHelpers.TryGetHashCode on Mono #91516
    area-CoreLib-mono, community-contribution
  • JIT: Fix case where we illegally optimize away a memory barrier on ARM32/ARM64 #91827
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasi] Work around WASI's mmap implementation not returning aligned m… #91761
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Enable rule CA1869 - Cache and reuse 'JsonSerializerOptions' #90895
    area-Meta, 9.0.0
  • Arm64: Pass the small size accurately to emitIns_valid_imm_for_ldst_offset #91741
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] [wasm] Refactor Request Streaming to use HttpContent.CopyToAsync #91699
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Mark `SString`'s single argument ctors as `explicit` #91822
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Detect aligned read in ReadUnaligned #91813
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Improve binder gen binding logic (init, member binding, polymorphism) #91717
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Delete the RequiresPreviewFeaturesAttribute from RefreshMemoryLimit #91688
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Dont' use bareword `bool` in icall sig macros #91808
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Improve perf of ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance() #91290
    tenet-performance, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Metrics Feature Switch #91767
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cannot install any tool using `dotnet tool install <package-id>` on .Net 7.0.400 SDK #35261

Closed

  • Dotnet SDK Installed via Snap is not working with Entity Framework Tool #34590

PullRequests

Created

  • RunCommand prints "Building..." by default if it needs to build #35263
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [main] Update dotnet/runtime #35048
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Make HelpCommand use the runtime to launch HTML #35255
    untriaged, Area-CLI

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Allow *not* generating documentation files for non-externally visible nodes #69872
  • Inline temporary variable adds unnecessary cast #69869
    Backlog

Closed

  • Stop processing during IncrementalValueProvider #69868
  • Perf: OperatorOverloadSyntaxClassifier unnecessarily realizes semantic model for certain nodes #69867

PullRequests

Created

  • Include implicit MyBase.New() call in IBlockOperation for VB Constructors #69873
    Area-Compilers, Feature - IOperation, untriaged
  • Fix braces issue fixed locally from last PR but accidentally not pushed before merge #69871
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Reduce work done in operator overload syntax classifier. #69866
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Handle non-member-overriding context in OverrideCompletion #69855
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Improve generic type argument list error recovery #69734
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Update the C# syntax generator to use a few more modern C# constructs. #69703
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Optimize `T ?? null` to `T` where `T` is a reference type #69803
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Parameters #69774
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Create a brokered service to delegate loading of projects to us #69857
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Nullable conversion of collection expressions #69852
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Reconsider default HSTS max-age value #50605
  • Blazor time to first UI improvement: blazorwasmbenchmark #50602
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #50601

Closed

  • RequestTimeouts not works as expected #50607
  • set serialization method for specific controllers #50540
  • PageTitle Not Updating #50017

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50608
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • Update HttpHeaders Keys #50606
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Fix blocking call in FindByEmailAsync #50603
    area-identity, community-contribution

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Add feature to expose IIS hosting details #50443
    area-networking, 8.0-rc2

Updated

  • Rename internal UseAck to UseStatefulReconnect #50407
    area-signalr, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Enable Swipe Back Gesture on hidden NavigationBar #17293
  • [iOS] - ScrollView getting extended over available space within Grid with RowDefinitions="Auto" #17291
  • ど素人の質問で申し訳ありませんが、、、 #17288

Closed

  • [iOS] - ScrollView getting extended over available space within Grid with RowDefinitions="Auto" #17292

PullRequests

Created

  • Fixes BindableLayout leaks on BindingContext #17290
    community ✨
  • Make Android respect power saving/disabled animations #17287

Updated

  • Add several InputTransparent UI tests #17286

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • When mapping a property to a string/json column in a group by, EF materializes inconsistent results #31675

Closed

  • Query: Distinct on entity containing primitive array gives wrong results when projecting multiple collections due to result bucketing issues #31398
    8.0.0
  • LINQ Expression (JsonQueryExpression) could not be translated #30830
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • API review updates #31673
  • Better handling of nullable element comparers #31672

Merged

  • Set the key comparer as well as the normal comparer when mapping a primitive collection #31661

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #31669
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
